013    package net.sf.oval.constraint;
014    
015    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
016    
017    import java.lang.reflect.Field;
018    import java.lang.reflect.Method;
019    import java.util.Map;
020    
021    import net.sf.oval.Validator;
022    import net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCheck;
023    import net.sf.oval.context.OValContext;
024    import net.sf.oval.exception.FieldNotFoundException;
025    import net.sf.oval.exception.InvokingMethodFailedException;
026    import net.sf.oval.exception.MethodNotFoundException;
027    import net.sf.oval.internal.ContextCache;
028    import net.sf.oval.internal.util.ReflectionUtils;
029    
030    /**
031     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
032     */
033    public class NotEqualToFieldCheck extends AbstractAnnotationCheck<NotEqualToField>
034    {
035            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
036    
037            private boolean useGetter;
038    
039            private String fieldName;
040    
041            private Class< ? > declaringClass;
042    
043            /**
044             * {@inheritDoc}
045             */
046            @Override
047            public void configure(final NotEqualToField constraintAnnotation)
048            {
049                    super.configure(constraintAnnotation);
050                    setFieldName(constraintAnnotation.value());
051                    setDeclaringClass(constraintAnnotation.declaringClass());
052                    setUseGetter(constraintAnnotation.useGetter());
053            }
054    
055            /**
056             * @return the declaringClass
057             */
058            public Class< ? > getDeclaringClass()
059            {
060                    return declaringClass;
061            }
062    
063            /**
064             * @return the fieldName
065             */
066            public String getFieldName()
067            {
068                    return fieldName;
069            }
070    
071            /**
072             * {@inheritDoc}
073             */
074            public boolean isSatisfied(final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
075                            final Validator validator)
076            {
077                    if (valueToValidate == null) return true;
078    
079                    final Class< ? > clazz = validatedObject.getClass();
080    
081                    final Object valueToCompare;
082                    if (useGetter)
083                    {
084                            final Method getter = ReflectionUtils.getGetterRecursive(clazz, fieldName);
085                            if (getter == null)
086                                    throw new MethodNotFoundException("Getter for field <" + fieldName + "> not found in class <" + clazz
087                                                    + "> or it's super classes.");
088    
089                            try
090                            {
091                                    valueToCompare = getter.invoke(validatedObject);
092                            }
093                            catch (final Exception ex)
094                            {
095                                    throw new InvokingMethodFailedException(getter.getName(), validatedObject,
096                                                    ContextCache.getMethodReturnValueContext(getter), ex);
097                            }
098                    }
099                    else
100                    {
101                            final Field field = ReflectionUtils.getFieldRecursive(clazz, fieldName);
102    
103                            if (field == null)
104                                    throw new FieldNotFoundException("Field <" + fieldName + "> not found in class <" + clazz
105                                                    + "> or it's super classes.");
106    
107                            valueToCompare = ReflectionUtils.getFieldValue(field, validatedObject);
108                    }
109    
110                    if (valueToCompare == null) return true;
111    
112                    return !valueToValidate.equals(valueToCompare);
113            }
114    
115            /**
116             * @return the useGetter
117             */
118            public boolean isUseGetter()
119            {
120                    return useGetter;
121            }
122    
123            /**
124             * @param declaringClass the declaringClass to set
125             */
126            public void setDeclaringClass(final Class< ? > declaringClass)
127            {
128                    this.declaringClass = declaringClass == Void.class ? null : declaringClass;
129                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
130            }
131    
132            /**
133             * @param fieldName the fieldName to set
134             */
135            public void setFieldName(final String fieldName)
136            {
137                    this.fieldName = fieldName;
138                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
139            }
140    
141            /**
142             * @param useGetter the useGetter to set
143             */
144            public void setUseGetter(final boolean useGetter)
145            {
146                    this.useGetter = useGetter;
147                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
148            }
149    
150            /**
151             * {@inheritDoc}
152             */
153            @Override
154            public Map<String, String> createMessageVariables()
155            {
156                    final Map<String, String> messageVariables = getCollectionFactory().createMap(2);
157                    messageVariables.put("fieldName", fieldName);
158                    messageVariables.put("declaringClass", declaringClass == null || declaringClass == Void.class ? null
159                                    : declaringClass.getName());
160                    messageVariables.put("useGetter", Boolean.toString(useGetter));
161                    return messageVariables;
162            }
163    }
